name: Mooncraft
description:
Mooncraft is a voxel-based sandbox game set on the moon. This game was made for the 24-hour #MinecraftJam using GameMaker: Studio 1.4.

Collect lunar resources to build a moon base and keep yourself alive.

Current Features:

  • Procedurally generated terrain
  • Iron and silicon randomly scattered throughout the world
  • Low gravity movement
  • 4 different types of blocks
  • Simple inventory system
  • Collecting of resources

Due to time reasons, I had to postpone the following features:

  • Crafting
  • Building
  • Infinite terrain

Development notes:

  • I was able to spend ~12 hours developing this game in its current state
  • I initially planned to include infinite terrain generation in this version, however, I wasn't able to have it perform well enough with the time I had
  • I used this Perlin-noise script
  • I reused and modified collision detection code from one of my earlier projects
  • The rest of the code and graphics was entirely done by me within the duration of the jam
